db:abstract.db:para: The QGLShader class allows OpenGL shaders to be compiled.

db:para.db:emphasis: This class is deprecated. We strongly advise against using it in new code.

db:abstract.db:para: This class was introduced in Qt 4.6.

db:para.db:emphasis: This class is deprecated. We strongly advise against using it in new code.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This class supports shaders written in the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL) and in the OpenGL/ES Shading Language (GLSL/ES).
QGLShader and QGLShaderProgram shelter the programmer from the details of compiling and linking vertex and fragment shaders.

db:note.db:para: This class has been deprecated in favor of QOpenGLShader.

db:section.db:title: enum QGLShader::ShaderTypeBit
db:section.db:para: This enum specifies the type of QGLShader that is being created.

db:td.db:para: Vertex shader written in the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL).
Fragment shader written in the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL).
Geometry shaders written in the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL), based on the GL_EXT_geometry_shader4 extension.

db:section.db:para: The ShaderType type is a typedef for QFlags<ShaderTypeBit>. It stores an OR combination of ShaderTypeBit values.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QGLShader::QGLShader(QGLShader::ShaderType type, QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QGLShader object of the specified type and attaches it to parent. If shader programs are not supported, QGLShaderProgram::hasOpenGLShaderPrograms() will return false.
This constructor is normally followed by a call to compileSourceCode() or compileSourceFile().
The shader will be associated with the current QGLContext.

db:section.db:title: QGLShader::QGLShader(QGLShader::ShaderType type, const QGLContext *context, QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QGLShader object of the specified type and attaches it to parent. If shader programs are not supported, then QGLShaderProgram::hasOpenGLShaderPrograms() will return false.
This constructor is normally followed by a call to compileSourceCode() or compileSourceFile().
The shader will be associated with context.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QGLShader::~QGLShader()
db:section.db:para: Deletes this shader. If the shader has been attached to a QGLShaderProgram object, then the actual shader will stay around until the QGLShaderProgram is destroyed.

db:section.db:title: bool QGLShader::compileSourceCode(const char *source)
db:section.db:para: Sets the source code for this shader and compiles it. Returns true if the source was successfully compiled, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: bool QGLShader::compileSourceCode(const QByteArray &source)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the source code for this shader and compiles it. Returns true if the source was successfully compiled, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: bool QGLShader::compileSourceCode(const QString &source)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the source code for this shader and compiles it. Returns true if the source was successfully compiled, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: bool QGLShader::compileSourceFile(const QString &fileName)
db:section.db:para: Sets the source code for this shader to the contents of fileName and compiles it. Returns true if the file could be opened and the source compiled, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: [static, since 4.7] bool QGLShader::hasOpenGLShaders(QGLShader::ShaderType type, const QGLContext *context = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if shader programs of type type are supported on this system; false otherwise.
The context is used to resolve the GLSL extensions. If context is null, then QGLContext::currentContext() is used.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.7.

db:section.db:title: bool QGLShader::isCompiled() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this shader has been compiled; false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: QString QGLShader::log() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the errors and warnings that occurred during the last compile.

db:section.db:title: GLuint QGLShader::shaderId() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the OpenGL identifier associated with this shader.

db:section.db:title: QGLShader::ShaderType QGLShader::shaderType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the type of this shader.

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QGLShader::sourceCode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the source code for this shader.
